prompts.prompt: List the most recent high severity security alerts. Show alert title, status, assigned analyst, and creation date.

template.name: list-high-severity-alerts
template.title: List high severity alerts
template.description: Lists recent security alerts with high severity, showing key triage details.

prompts.prompt: Show details for the security alert with ID {alertId}. Include its title, description, status, incident link, and timestamps.

template.name: get-alert-details
template.title: Get alert details
template.description: Fetches detailed info for a given security alert by its ID.

arguments.name: alertId
arguments.description: The unique identifier of the security alert.

prompts.prompt: List all security incidents that are currently active. For each incident, show its name, status, and when it was first and last active.

template.name: list-active-incidents
template.title: List active incidents
template.description: Shows currently active security incidents with their names, status, and activity timestamps.

prompts.prompt: Show my organization's Secure Score over the last 7 days, including current and maximum score for each day.

template.name: show-secure-score-trend
template.title: Show secure score trend
template.description: Displays the Secure Score trend for the last 7 days, including score values and dates.

prompts.prompt: List all Secure Score controls for the 'Identity' category, including control name, action type, and implementation cost.

template.name: list-identity-controls
template.title: List identity controls
template.description: Lists all Secure Score controls in the Identity category, showing control name, action type, and cost.

prompts.prompt: Show the 10 most recent threat indicators of type 'ip'. Include each indicator's display name, threat type, and when it was created.

template.name: list-recent-ip-threat-indicators
template.title: List recent IP threat indicators
template.description: Shows the 10 latest threat indicators of type IP, with display name, threat type, and creation time.

prompts.prompt: List all Secure Score controls where the recommended action type is 'Configuration'. Show the control name and action URL.

template.name: list-configuration-controls
template.title: List configuration controls
template.description: Lists all Secure Score controls where the action type is Configuration, showing name and direct action link.
